Appendix 5
SEMINARS AND "WORKSHOPS
(Ford and FAE Funds)
1953 Lincoln Lodge Seminar: General Planning for ETV. University of Wis¬
consin , June 21-27. 45 participants. (FAE)
1953 ETV Management Seminar. Iowa State College, August 30 - September
5. 19 participants. (FAE)
1953 First ETV Production Workshop. University of Illinois, August 28 -
September 18. 17 participants. (FAE)
1954 Second ETV Production Workshop. Michigan State University,
August 23 - September 10. 26 participants. (FAE)
1954 First ETV Engineering Workshop. New York City, October 19 - 27.
27 participants. (FAE)
1955 Third ETV Production Workshop. State University of Iowa, August 14 -
September 3. 30 participants. (FAE)
1955 Second ETV Engineering Workshop. Michigan State University,
September 12 - 16. 25 participants. (FAE)
1956 ETV Staging and Lighting Workshop. University of Michigan,
August 19 - 22. 20 participants. (Ford)
1956 ETV Program Planning Seminar. University of Wisconsin, August 26 -
September 1. 27 participants. (Ford)
1957 ETV Management Seminar. Allerton Park (University of Illinois),
August 19 - 25. 24 participants. (Ford)
1958 Seminar on Children's Television Programs. Boston University,
March 29-April 1. 21 participants. (Ford)
1958 ETV Engineering Video Recording Workshop. Chicago, May 5-9.
3 0 participants. (Ford)
1958 Seminar on Instructional Uses of Television and Radio. Purdue Univer¬
sity, July 21-25. 26 participants. (Ford)
